about_the_game:
A unique narrative investigation game, somewhere between Ace Attorney and Criminal Minds.

Yep, quite a gap, right?

As a young FBI agent freshly landed in the field, you will face all sorts of situations and encounter a variety of characters. Your choices, your intuition, and your deductions will dictate the course of the story.

How you interact with characters, the clues you find at crime scenes, and the psychological analysis you perform on suspects, victims, and other protagonists will determine the progression of the adventure, the success or failure of each investigation... and, of course, the outcome of the game and the central arc of Profiler Files.

  • Branching narrative with multiple endings, within each episode and at the final resolution.
  • Point-and-click investigation.
  • Colorful characters and plenty of humor... which doesn't prevent serious, sometimes even grave, themes worthy of the best crime series.

    Thanks to THIS FULLY PLAYABLE demo of Profiler Files , so you can see firsthand what the final product should look like. The demo includes the very first episode of the game and showcases the core mechanics of Profiler Files. Dialogue choices, searching for clues in the environment, profiling, variations in story progression, and alternative endings – everything that will be at the heart of Profiler Files is there!

name: Profiler Files - New Orleans - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
